{{Infobox battle item |name = Underground |image = [[File:Underground1.png|thumb]] |caption = The Underground |location = Kanto }} ==Description== The [[Underground]] is unlocked when you purchase the [[Explorer Kit]] located in [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cinnabar Island Shop]]. It also has its own currency called [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} that can be used to purchase upgrades for the Underground or [[Masterball]] at the [[Shops|Pokémon League]]. For more information about the Underground, open it by clicking on it after you purchased the [[Explorer Kit]] and click on the '''Help''' tab. ==Upgrades== === Upgrade Explanations === # Max Energy - Increases the maximum energy of the player # Max Items - Increases the maximum amount of items that can spawn on a layer # Min Items - Increases the minimum amount of items that can spawn on a layer # Energy Restored - Increases the amount of energy regained by the player on each energy regeneration # Energy Regeneration Time - Decreases the amount of time between each energy regeneration # Daily Deals - Increases the amount of daily deals offered # Bomb Efficiency - Increases the number of tiles destroyed with each bomb # Survey Cost - Decreases the cost of the Survey ability # Survey Efficiency - Increases the amount of tiles mined by Survey ability # Larger Underground, +1 Max Item - Increases the Underground by two columns and two rows (1 on each side of the rectangle), Also increases the maximum amount of items that can spawn on a layer by one === Upgrade Table === {| class="wikitable" |- !
